subject: Horse Racing
Irish Derby (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Trading Leather, a 6-1 shot ridden by Kevin Manning and trained by Jim Bolger, won the Irish Derby ahead of Galileo Rock at the Curragh racecourse in County Kildare.
snippet: Trading Leather, a 6-1 shot ridden by Kevin Manning and trained by Jim Bolger, won the Irish Derby ahead of Galileo Rock at the Curragh racecourse in County Kildare.
